title: Charged Twice for On Sale Skin
body: I recently purchased the "Battlecast Kog'Maw" skin which was on sale for 675 RP. Instead of charging me 675 RP, I was charged 1350 and on my purchase history, it even shows up as two 675 RP purchases on Battlecast Kog'Maw. I understand this is probably a bug but still, I was charged twice the amount it's supposed to charge me. Can somebody please help? I already tried restarting my client. [Proof](https://p6.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/dvqUcIFVpz4y3HpGUBLxIIJzx?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..gRZ-iDV8paw7qqg7rIqfSA.Hz_mZ_pvuyW6X5XllhiNsInWREkcELXeh-4MSvndQuNNS4PvvNnKXRbFULkWO-sHKUtt80FacHxkRtUAPv0Tgkv2GFEAdwQnH5pMOkDI9MVarqinc4FH0VhzcIA1-7JN5-Jp0tzGaqc_oZKi-7lZn73EYWGo3yyKXNW2_jVSnwIOwXmhPfKcoPqYjwa0Twk5VO1phLGWMPrRUQPr_X1QXnnyR5FUKd6mL9U4kBioGAhtXySo6v_osQlqDFlWD2E9Y-3uRJaUy5McJ-YLyQIIQaUdj7oKfFHwGJq2Zq0SFOE.bjT_lOrzLhiAn7-uBpSFZA)

replies.body:
Ayyyyy looks like one of our billing agents got that taken care of already in a ticket/live chat!
